name: semaphore
description: Semaphore (by semaphoreio) provides components for CI/CD pipelines and job orchestration. It focuses on integrating code repositories with build and deploy workflows through a modern web and API-driven interface.
features: CI/CD pipelines: Build, test, and deploy code with automated workflow pipelines.
Repository integration: Connects to GitHub, GitLab, and Bitbucket for source control.
Parallel execution: Runs multiple jobs simultaneously to reduce build times.
Docker support: Build and test applications in Docker containers for consistency.
Deployment automation: Deploy to cloud platforms, servers, or Kubernetes clusters.
Environment management: Define separate environments for development, staging, and production.
Secret management: Securely store and inject credentials, API keys, and tokens.
Build caching: Speeds up builds by caching dependencies and artifacts.
Status notifications: Sends build results via email, Slack, or webhooks.
Branch workflows: Configure different pipelines for feature branches, PRs, and main branch.
Test reporting: Displays test results, coverage, and failure details in the UI.
Audit logs: Tracks all pipeline executions and configuration changes for compliance.
